name: Path of Shadows
dialogs: If you're reading this letter, you are the chosen one...
At midnight, knock three times with a stick in front of the abandoned well.
It's been a while since someone with potential arrived. Are you ready to walk the path of shadows?
This path cannot be reversed. Once you step in, you must go to the end.
Good. Let's start with the first trial. Learn how to become a true shadow.
Impressive. But the real test starts now.
Eliminate the corrupt noble. Bring his seal as proof.
You've passed all trials. Now it's time to choose your path.
Shadow Assassin, Dark Mage, Night Tracker... What will you become?
You are now one of us. Receive the mark of shadows.
This mark is your new identity. Use it wisely.
